description: Welcome to Lamplighter. This well-located 4-bedroom, 2 full bathroom townhome offers 1,573 sq ft of living space across a functional 3-level split layout. The home features a south-facing patios and the convenience of a covered parking stall. The versatile layout suits a variety of lifestyles, with options for updates based on your preferences. The strata is family-oriented, and residents enjoy access to a greenbelt area that provides additional outdoor space. Ideally situated in the heart of Central Lonsdale, youâ€™re close to shops, services, transit, parks, and local schools including Queen Mary Elementary and Carson Graham Secondary. With easy access to major routes, this home offers a practical opportunity for anyone seeking long-term value in a well-established community.
